search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Missive (missive.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

extracted_content.content:

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Can I try Missive first?

Yes! Everyone starts on Missive’s free plan so they can test out features and functionality, to make sure there is a good fit. No credit card is required.

Can I import more than one account?

Yes, Missive supports connecting multiple accounts (email, SMS, WhatsApp, etc.). Each user can have up to 10 personal accounts and 5 shared accounts. For example, an organization with 10 users can have up to 50 shared accounts, and an organization with 100 users can have up to 500 shared accounts. Additional shared accounts can be purchased.

Will my personal emails be shared with my coworkers?

No, your coworkers will never see your personal emails by default. You can choose to grant them access to your account or invite them on a per-conversation basis.

What devices do you support?

Missive is primarily a web app, accessible from any web browser.  
We also offer mobile apps (iOS and Android) and desktop apps (macOS and Windows). Visit our [download page.](https://missiveapp.com/download)

Can you help migrate my existing system?

If you're migrating from Google Workspace or Outlook, the process will be straightforward — see [here](https://missiveapp.com/faq/change-imap-server). For migrations from platforms like Front, we've created a simple guide, which you can find [here](https://missiveapp.com/faq/migrate-from-front).

Our team is always happy to assist and ensure you get the most out of Missive. Don’t hesitate to reach out!

Can I add or remove users later?

Yes — Admins can add more users to the team. You can also remove individual team users from your plan through Admin controls. For Yearly plans, you will continue to pay for the removed user until the end of the billing period, but if you add a new team member, the seat will be re-assigned to them.

What happens if we cancel our subscription?

After canceling your plan, you will retain access to all features until the end of your current billing cycle. Once the billing cycle ends, your content will remain available in read-only mode.

Still have more questions?

We would love to help — Visit [our help center](https://missiveapp.com/help) or simply [email us.](mailto:contact@missiveapp.com?subject=Inquiry%20regarding%20Missive%20app)

We also [host a bi-weekly demo](https://calendly.com/luis-missive/missive-the-team-inbox?back=1&month=2024-10) where we share tips and tricks for getting the most out of Missive and discover how it can help improve your team collaboration and communication.

We love building for small businesses
-------------------------------------

4.8

500+ reviews

Across G2, Capterra and TrustPilot

We live in our inboxes.  
Let’s make email enjoyable.
-----------------------------------------------------

Try us out for free, invite a few people to get a feel, and upgrade when you’re ready.

4.8 → Over 500 reviews

Try Missive risk-free for 30 days with your whole team. Unlock unlimited integrations, advanced security, custom rules, and more when you upgrade.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual billing offers a 20% discount compared to monthly billing.

additional_fees.fee_description: Can be purchased for organizations exceeding the default shared account limits.
